Coding is a way of giving instructions to the computer

Pressing Ctrl + Shift + I opens up the

console

a way to try out code one line at a time

Using Functions

a set of instructions grouped together

"Calling" a function

tells the computer to run the instructions grouped in that function

What calling a function looks like

alert();

Let's try it

We just tried:

  • alert();
  • prompt();
  • Math.random();

Let's try some other functions

We just tried:

  • cecil.moveRandom();
  • cecil.moveRandom;
  • cecil.moveRandom.toString();

Let's see what else we can tell Cecil to do!

Typing in cecil. will show you.

What if you want to move Cecil to a specific place?

Try cecil.move().

cecil.move("left", 100);

Other functions to try:

  • cecil.moveTo(300, 300);
cecil.change(someImageLinkHere);
cecil.name("Cecil");
cecil.reset();
cecil.flip();
cecil.getPosition();
cecil.getSize();
cecil.getElement();
